Summary: strange object seen out of airliner
divs: sighting detailson august 16 i was flying from chicago illinois to portland oregon and about 50 minutes before landing i saw a black object outside the window. it was all black with no visible canopy, and a looked similar to the x-15 spaceplane but a little bit wider and with smaller(but still noticeable) wings. it was descending very fast; at least 3\2 glide path, and it had a twin all black contrail. i do not know the size of the object or how far away it was, but i would guess about a mile away and 70-80ft long. it was moving very fast and moved across my field of view through the window in about 5 seconds. i do not know where we were over but it there was a desert plaine with mountians of 3 sides. by the time i thought to wake the person sitting next to me the object was out of sight.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cody
This sighting has never been favorited.
